did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Kelly, Parsons, Canfield and Stein, Planning Consultants.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Maps, plans, and perspectives relating to urban renewal in Ithaca, New York, prepared by the firm of Kelly, Parsons, Canfield and Stein, Planning Consultants.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: K. C. (Kermit C.) Parsons and Stuart Stein are professors at Cornell University College of Architecture. Thomas Canfield is a Cornell Professor Emeritus of Architecture; Burnham Kelly is a Professor Emeritus of City and Regional Planning, also at Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Maps, plans, and perspectives relating to urban renewal in Ithaca, New York, prepared by the firm of Kelly, Parsons, Canfield and Stein, Planning Consultants.
